Name: Dreamlands: Cotton Candy Hunt
About the game: A dream comes true ... Collect cotton candies and discover Dreamlands. Attention, danger, new challenges wait for you in each level and the clock is ticking! Only the fastest will master it. Choose one of the characters Macy or Luke and unlock new skins. Master your skills in this one-screen platformer: Precise jumps, accurate timing, knowing the fastest way - and you will make it. Clear the campaign and get trophies. Compare your best time with your friends. Time-Runs - the Challenges for experts. Not difficult enough? Be the first to master the marathon run: Play all levels at once, never successfully seen.
